INFORMATION.ORDINALS_ADDRESS_TOOLTIP: These sats are used for your ordinals and runes. They cannot be spent with Xverse wallet.

LANDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_1_TITLE: Store BTC, Runes, Ordinals, BRC-20, Rare Sats, STX and more!
LANDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_2_TITLE: Connect to your favorite Bitcoin apps

LEDGER_IMPORT_SCREEN.LEDGER_IMPORT_1_SUBTITLE: Connecting a Ledger hardware wallet to Xverse is the most secure way to store your Bitcoin, Runes, Ordinals, Stacks, BRC-20 and SIP-10 tokens, and more.
LEDGER_IMPORT_SCREEN.LEDGER_IMPORT_2_SUBTITLE: Choose the assets you want to manage with this wallet.
LEDGER_IMPORT_SCREEN.LEDGER_IMPORT_2_FOOTNOTE: If you don't want to set a Stacks address now, you have the possibility to set it up later.

LEDGER_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Bitcoin app.
LEDGER_CONNECT.STX_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Stacks app.
LEDGER_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE_FAILED: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorised by your browser and the Bitcoin app is open.
LEDGER_CONNECT.STX_SUBTITLE_FAILED: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorised by your browser and the Stacks app is open.

LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.SUBTITLE: This is the address generated by the hardware wallet. Verify that this address matches the address displayed on your device.
LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.ALERT: Verify that these addresses match the addresses displayed on the device.
LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.ALREADY_CONNECTED_WARNING: An account has already been added to your wallet from this device. Would you like to create a new account?
LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.CONFIRM_TO_CONTINUE: Confirm on your device to continue.
LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.SUBTITLE_CANCELLED: The account import process was cancelled on the device.

LEDGER_ADDRESS_ADDED.SUBTITLE: You can now receive & send Bitcoin, Runes, Ordinals and BRC-20 tokens using Xverse and Ledger.
LEDGER_ADDRESS_ADDED.SUBTITLE_STX: You can now receive & send STX, Stacks NFTs and SIP-10 tokens using Xverse and Ledger.

LEDGER_ADD_ACCOUNT_NAME.TITLE: Name your Ledger wallet
LEDGER_ADD_ACCOUNT_NAME.SUBTITLE: You can give your wallet a custom name.

LEDGER_IMPORT_END.TITLE: Your wallet is ready!
LEDGER_IMPORT_END.SUBTITLE: You can switch to this wallet from the accounts selection drop-down.

LEDGER_STX_WALLET_ADDED.TITLE: Stacks wallet added
LEDGER_STX_WALLET_ADDED.SUBTITLE: You can now receive & send STX, Stacks NFTs and SIP-10 tokens using this wallet.

LEDGER_BEFORE_GETTING_STARTED.TITLE: Before getting started
LEDGER_BEFORE_GETTING_STARTED.DESCRIPTION: Please select one of the following options to continue.

OPTIONS.USE_LEDGER_LIVE: I am using Ledger Live with this device.
OPTIONS.DONT_USE_LEDGER_LIVE: I am not using Ledger Live with this device.

IMPORTANT_WARNING.TITLE: Important - Please read
IMPORTANT_WARNING.TEXT_1: It is not recommended to use Xverse and Ledger Live, or other Bitcoin wallets with the same hardware device as this could lead to unintentional transfers of Ordinals.
IMPORTANT_WARNING.TEXT_2: You should use a separate device for Xverse and Ordinals or set a passphrase on your Ledger to create a different set of accounts for Xverse. See
IMPORTANT_WARNING.TEXT_3: Only continue if you're an advanced user and you know what you're doing. Do not create and use a taproot address on Ledger Live if you are using Xverse.
IMPORTANT_WARNING.PASSPHRASE_FOR_ORDINALS: How To Set A Passphrase For Ordinals
IMPORTANT_WARNING.UNDERSTAND_THE_RISKS: I understand the risks and wish to continue anyway
IMPORTANT_WARNING.UNDERSTAND_SHOULD_NOT_USE_LEDGER_LIVE: I understand I should not use Ledger Live or other Bitcoin wallets with the same hardware device

LEDGER_IMPORT_SCREEN.ADDRESS_MISMATCH: There's a mismatch between your signing address and the address you're logged in with.

KEYSTONE_IMPORT_SCREEN.KEYSTONE_IMPORT_1_SUBTITLE: Keystone supports up to 3 sets of seed phrases to store different assets. You can use one Keystone hardware wallet to manage your Ordinals, Runes, and BRC-20 assets separately.

KEYSTONE_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Keystone device, make sure it's unlocked, and on the homepage.
KEYSTONE_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE_FAILED: Unable to connect to device, missing browser permissions, please grant Keystone permissions.
KEYSTONE_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE_REJECT_FAILED: Keystone request was cancelled. To proceed, please reauthorize.
KEYSTONE_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE_PAGE_FAILED: Please reconnect the Keystone on home screen and reauthorize.

KEYSTONE_ADDRESS_ADDED.SUBTITLE: You can now receive & send Bitcoin, Ordinals and BRC-20 tokens using Xverse and Keystone.

KEYSTONE_ADD_ACCOUNT_NAME.TITLE: Name your Keystone wallet
KEYSTONE_ADD_ACCOUNT_NAME.SUBTITLE: You can give your wallet a custom name.

KEYSTONE_IMPORT_END.TITLE: Your wallet is ready!
KEYSTONE_IMPORT_END.SUBTITLE: You can switch to this wallet from the accounts selection drop-down.

KEYSTONE_STX_WALLET_ADDED.TITLE: Stacks wallet added
KEYSTONE_STX_WALLET_ADDED.SUBTITLE: You can now receive & send STX, Stacks NFTs and SIP-10 tokens using this wallet.

KEYSTONE_IMPORT_SCREEN.ADDRESS_MISMATCH: There's a mismatch between your signing address and the address you're logged with.

LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.SUBTITLE_VERIFY: Verify that this address matches the address displayed on your device.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.BTC_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Do not send Ordinals, Runes, or BRC-20 to this address, use your Ordinals receive address.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.ORDINALS_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Only send Ordinals, Runes, or BRC-20 tokens to this address.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.STX_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Only send SIP-010 tokens to this address
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.SUBTITLE_CANCELLED: The account address was rejected on the device.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.BTC_SUBTITLE_FAILED: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorised by your browser and the Bitcoin app is open.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.STX_SUBTITLE_FAILED: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorised by your browser and the Stacks app is open.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.WRONG_DEVICE_ERROR_SUBTITLE: The public key of the connected device did not match the wallet public key. Make sure you have the correct device connected.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.ADDRESS_MISMATCH: There's a mismatch between the address you're verifying and the address you're logged with.

LEDGER_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Bitcoin app.
LEDGER_CONNECT.STX_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Stacks app.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect your hardware wallet
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: To continue, connect and unlock your device.
CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Bitcoin app.
CONNECT.STX_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Stacks app.
CONNECT.BTC_ERROR_SUBTITLE: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorised by your browser and the Bitcoin app is open.
CONNECT.STX_ERROR_SUBTITLE: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorised by your browser and the Stacks app is open.
CONNECT.WRONG_DEVICE_ERROR_SUBTITLE: The public key of the connected device did not match the wallet public key. Make sure you have the correct device connected.

EXTERNAL_INPUTS.TITLE: External inputs
EXTERNAL_INPUTS.SUBTITLE: Your device may display a warning regarding external inputs. This is expected as you'll be signing inputs from two addresses in one transaction.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm transaction
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Confirm the transaction on your device to continue.
CONFIRM.ERROR_SUBTITLE: The transaction has been rejected. You can try again or close this tab.

ORDINAL_TX.ORDINAL_SUBTITLE: Confirm the Ordinal inscription transfer on your device.
ORDINAL_TX.BTC_SUBTITLE: Confirm the payment of transaction fees from the Bitcoin payment address on your device.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Transaction broadcast
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: Your transaction has been successfully broadcast. You can close this tab.
SUCCESS.BRC20_INFO: The inscription may take up to several hours to appear in your wallet. Once received, head to your collectible dashboard and send it to your recipient to complete the token transfer.

DASHBOARD_SCREEN.REMOVE_FROM_LIST_DESCRIPTION: This will remove this wallet from this list. You can import it again by connecting your device.

DATA_COLLECTION_POPUP.TITLE: Help us improve Xverse!
DATA_COLLECTION_POPUP.DESCRIPTION: Help improve the app experience, by allowing Xverse to collect anonymized usage data. This data cannot be used to identify you or your wallet.

ERRORS.SIP10_BALANCE: Failed to load SIP-10 token balances
ERRORS.BRC20_BALANCE: Failed to load BRC-20 token balances

NATIVE_SEGWIT.TITLE: Native SegWit is here!
NATIVE_SEGWIT.DESCRIPTION_1c: addresses for lower fees and better performance!
NATIVE_SEGWIT.DESCRIPTION_2: You can select your preferred Bitcoin payment address (native or nested) used for sending, receiving, and connecting with apps.
NATIVE_SEGWIT.DESCRIPTION_3: Your Bitcoin balance includes funds from both addresses, and you can switch back anytime.

NATIVE_SEGWIT.TITLE: Now using Native SegWit!
NATIVE_SEGWIT.DESCRIPTION: Your new Native SegWit address is set as preferred. Switch back to Nested SegWit in Settings.

TOKEN_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: Select which assets you would like to see on your dashboard.

RECEIVE.STX_ADDRESS_DESC: Only send SIP-010 tokens to this address
RECEIVE.ORDINALS_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Only use this address to receive Ordinals, Runes, and BRC-20 tokens.
RECEIVE.STX_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Only use this address to receive STX, SIP-10 tokens & Stacks NFTs
RECEIVE.BTC_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Only use this address to receive Bitcoin.

NATIVE_SEGWIT.TITLE: Now using Native SegWit!
NATIVE_SEGWIT.DESCRIPTION: Your new Native SegWit address is set as preferred address.

ADDRESS_CHANGE_TOOLTIP.TITLE: Switch Preferred Bitcoin Address
ADDRESS_CHANGE_TOOLTIP.DESCRIPTION: You can switch between Native SegWit and Nested SegWit.

BTC.MAX_IGNORING_DUST_UTXO_MSG: Small amounts may remain in your wallet, as sending them costs more in fees than their value.
BTC.NO_FUNDS: You don't have any funds to send. You can purchase crypto quickly and deposit directly into your Xverse wallet.
BTC.SELECT_ADDRESS_TYPE_DESCRIPTION: Select your preferred address to send BTC. Using Native SegWit is recommended for reduced fees and better performance.

SEND.NAME: Name
SEND.MEMO_INFO: Adding a memo can have an impact on the transaction fee.
SEND.NO_FUNDS: You don't have any funds to send.

ERRORS.BELOW_MINIMUM_AMOUNT: Amount should not be less than 1500 sats
ERRORS.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE_FEES: Insufficient balance when including transaction fees
ERRORS.NFT_SEND_DETAIL: This Nft is already sent and is in pending state
ERRORS.ORDINAL_NOT_OWNED: This ordinal is not owned by your active account

INFO.ADDRESS_SUPPORTS_RARE_SATS: Make sure the recipient address supports Rare Sats.

SEND.MAKE_SURE_THE_RECIPIENT: Make sure the recipient address supports Ordinals. Items sent to the wrong address cannot be recovered.
SEND.SEND_BRC20_ORDINAL_WALLET_WARNING: Transferring this Ordinal inscription will initiate the transfer of your BRC-20 tokens.
SEND.SEND_ORDINAL_TO_SELF_WARNING: You are about to transfer an Ordinal to yourself
SEND.SEND_BRC20_ORDINAL_TO_SELF_WARNING: You are about to transfer BRC-20 tokens to yourself
SEND.SEND_BTC_TO_SELF_WARNING: You are about to transfer BTC to yourself
SEND.RATE_TOO_LOW: Set fee is below minimum of {{minFee}} sats/vB
SEND.RATE_TOO_HIGH: Set fee is above maximum of {{maxFee}} sats/vB
SEND.SPEND_DELEGATED_STX: You are transferring some STX that is registered for the next stacking cycle. The amount transferred will be subtracted from your current stacking pool delegation, and will not be locked to generate rewards in the next cycle.
SEND.EMPTY_RUNE_BALANCE: You don't have any {{symbol}} to send. You can swap BTC for {{symbol}} with Xverse.

CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.SPONSORED_TX_INFO: This is a sponsored transaction, no transaction fees will be deducted from your account.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.NAME: Name
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.THIS_MAY_TAKE_A_FEW_MINUTES: This may take a few minutes, please keep this window open.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.CHECK_THE_APP_YOU_USE: Please check the app you are using.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.PSBT_NO_BROADCAST_DISCLAIMER: This transaction will not be broadcast from your wallet. It may be broadcast later by a third party.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.PSBTS_NO_BROADCAST_DISCLAIMER: These transactions will not be broadcast from your wallet. They may be broadcast later by a third party.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.PSBT_SIG_HASH_NONE_DISCLAIMER: Signing this transaction gives the requester full authority over your funds; they may alter fund destinations. Use with understanding of potential fund loss.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.PSBT_CANT_PARSE_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: The requested transaction is invalid and cannot be processed. Please contact the developer of the requesting app for support.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.PSBT_INSUFFICIENT_RUNES: This transaction is attempting to send more confirmed Runes than you have. It may send fewer Runes than intended.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.PSBT_INDEX_CANT_PARSE_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: The requested transaction at {{index}} index is invalid and cannot be processed. Please contact the developer of the requesting app for support.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.SCRIPT_OUTPUT_TX: This transaction contains a script output. Be sure you trust the source of this transaction before confirming it.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.ORDINAL_DETECTED_WARNING: Ordinal inscription detected in transaction. Continuing will cause your ordinal to be transferred away.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.BTC_TRANSFER_DANGER_ALERT_DESC: You are about to make a Bitcoin transfer which contains an ordinal inscription. Once transferred out of the wallet, you will not be able to recover them.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.HIGH_FEE_WARNING_TEXT: The estimated transaction fee for this transaction is very high.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.UNCONFIRMED_BALANCE_WARNING: You are spending unconfirmed outputs in this transaction. This may lower the effective fee rate causing delays in transaction confirmation
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.RUNES_CENOTAPH_WARNING: This transaction will burn all input Runes. Make sure you trust the requesting app.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.BTC_TRANSFER_WARNING: This amount may include the network fee.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect your hardware wallet
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: To continue, plug and unlock your device.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE: We haven't been able to connect to your device.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm the transaction
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Authorise the transaction on your device to continue.
CONFIRM.ERROR_SUBTITLE: The transaction have been rejected. You can try again or close this tab.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Transaction broadcast
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: Your transaction has been successfully broadcast. You can close this tab.

INPUTS_WARNING.SUBTITLE: Your device may display a warning regarding external inputs and the use of default sighash signature type. This is expected as you'll be signing inputs from two addresses in one transaction, using a non-default signature type.

CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.INSCRIBED_SATS: Some of these sats are inscribed
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.INSCRIBED_RARE_SATS: Some of these sats are rare or inscribed
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.UNCONFIRMED_UTXO_WARNING: You are spending unconfirmed outputs in this transaction. This may lower the effective fee rate causing delays in transaction confirmation
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.INSCRIBED_RARE_SATS_WARNING: Your payment wallet holds rare or inscribed sats. To avoid spending them in your transactions and fees, transfer them to your ordinals wallet
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.RUNE_TERM_ENDED: This rune has passed its mint term and can no longer be minted.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.RUNE_IS_CLOSED: This rune is closed and cannot be minted.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.RUNE_DELEGATION_DESCRIPTION: This is a partial transaction with undetermined Runes recipients. You are delegating your Runes to the requesting app. The requesting app can burn your runes or transfer them to any recipient
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.POST_CONDITION_MODE_WARNING_TEXT: This transaction might be unsafe. Be sure you trust the source of this transaction before confirming it. (Unsafe post condition mode)
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.QUOTE_EXPIRES_IN: Note that this swap quote will expire after {{seconds}} seconds

TX_ERRORS.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE: The requested transaction cannot be created due to insufficient balance
TX_ERRORS.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE_FEES: Insufficient balance when including transaction fees

TRANSACTION_SETTING.FEE_INFO: Apply a higher fee to help your transaction confirm quickly, especially when the network is congested.
TRANSACTION_SETTING.NONCE_INFO: You can use a custom nonce to replace a pending transaction with the same nonce.
TRANSACTION_SETTING.SAME_FEE_ERROR: New fee must be greater than current fee
TRANSACTION_SETTING.GREATER_FEE_ERROR: Fee is more than available balance
TRANSACTION_SETTING.NONCE_WARNING: Entering an erroneous nonce can result in a failed transaction. Only apply changes if you know what you are doing.

CONNECT_HARDWARE_WALLET.TITLE: Add hardware wallet account
CONNECT_HARDWARE_WALLET.SUBTITLE: Select which device you would like to connect to Xverse.

TRANSACTION_STATUS.SUCCESS_MSG: Your transaction has been successfully submitted.
TRANSACTION_STATUS.SPONSORED_MSG: This transaction will be broadcast by the sponsor
TRANSACTION_STATUS.BRC20_ORDINAL_MSG: The inscription may take up to several hours to appear in your wallet. Once received, head to your collectible dashboard and send it to your recipient to complete the token transfer.
TRANSACTION_STATUS.SPONSOR_SERVICE_ERROR: If the issue persist, try again at a later time, or uncheck the "Sponsor Transaction" option in the swap details.

LEGAL_SCREEN.SCREEN_SUBTITLE: Please review the Xverse Wallet Privacy Policy and Terms of Services.

AUTHORIZE_DATA_COLLECTION.TITLE: Authorize data collection
AUTHORIZE_DATA_COLLECTION.DESCRIPTION: We would like to collect anonymous usage data to better understand users and improve the app. You can change this setting at any time.

BACKUP_WALLET_SCREEN.SCREEN_SUBTITLE: Your seed phrase is the unique key that allows you to recover your wallet.
BACKUP_WALLET_SCREEN.SEED_PHRASE_VIEW_HEADING: Write down your seed phrase and make sure to keep it private. This is the unique key to your wallet.
BACKUP_WALLET_SCREEN.SEED_PHRASE_VERIFY_HEADING: Write your seed phrase to confirm you saved it properly.
BACKUP_WALLET_SCREEN.CONFIRM_YOUR_SEED_PHRASE: Confirm you've recorded your seed phrase correctly.

CREATE_PASSWORD_SCREEN.CREATE_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Create a strong password to protect your wallet. Your password must be at least 8 characters in length.
CREATE_PASSWORD_SCREEN.ENTER_PASSWORD_TITLE: Enter a password to protect your wallet
CREATE_PASSWORD_SCREEN.CONFIRM_PASSWORD_MATCH_ERROR: Please make sure your passwords match

WALLET_SUCCESS_SCREEN.SCREEN_SUBTITLE: Your new wallet has been created successfully, you can now connect to your wallet.
WALLET_SUCCESS_SCREEN.RESTORE_SCREEN_SUBTITLE: Your wallet has been successfully restored.

WALLET_EXISTS_SCREEN.SCREEN_SUBTITLE: A wallet was created or restored in another tab. Any seed phrases generated in this tab will not be valid. If unsure, please create a new wallet or restore from your backed up seed phrase.

AUTH_REQUEST_SCREEN.TITLE: Connection Request
AUTH_REQUEST_SCREEN.PERMISSIONS_TITLE: The app will be able to:
AUTH_REQUEST_SCREEN.PERMISSION_WALLET_BALANCE: See your wallet balance and activity
AUTH_REQUEST_SCREEN.PERMISSION_WALLET_TYPE_ACCESS: See which type of wallet you are using (software or hardware wallet)

NO_STACKS_AUTH_SUPPORT.TITLE: This wallet does not have a Stacks address.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect Your Ledger
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Stacks app.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE: We haven't been able to connect to your device.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm the signature
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Authorise the signature on your device to continue.
CONFIRM.ERROR_SUBTITLE: The signature has been rejected. You can try again or close this tab.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Signature confirmed
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: This transaction will be broadcast by the sponsor.

FORGOT_PASSWORD_SCREEN.TITLE: Forgot Password
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SCREEN.PARAGRAPH1: Xverse does not keep a copy of your password. If you're unable to access your account, you will need to reset your wallet and input the seed phrase you used when you generated your wallet.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SCREEN.PARAGRAPH2: This will reset your wallet from this browser. Make sure you have your seed phrase backed up.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SCREEN.BACKUP_CHECKBOX_LABEL: I backed up my seed phrase

SELECT_RESTORE_METHOD.DESCRIPTION: You can restore an existing wallet using your seed phrase.
SELECT_RESTORE_METHOD.TYPE_OR_PASTE_SEED_PHRASE: Type or paste your seed phrase

IMPORT_OTHER_WALLETS.DESCRIPTION: What wallet are you importing into Xverse?
IMPORT_OTHER_WALLETS.SELECT_OTHER_DESCRIPTION: Select Other, enter your seed phrase and we'll take care of the rest!

RESTORE_WALLET_SCREEN.ENTER_SEED_DESCRIPTION: Enter or paste your 12 or 24 word seed phrase to restore your wallet.

SELECT_DERIVATION_TYPE.TITLE: Select a Wallet to Restore
SELECT_DERIVATION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION: We found funds in two different wallets linked to your seed phrase. Choose which one to restore.

CALLOUT.TITLE: Not sure which one to pick?
CALLOUT.DESCRIPTION_1: Tap "See Accounts" to check balances, addresses, and recoverable funds before making a choice.
CALLOUT.DESCRIPTION_2: If you restore the wrong wallet, you can reset and try the other one anytime.

ACCOUNT_DETAIL.INFO_ACCOUNT_LIMIT: There are more accounts in this derivation path, but only the first ten are displayed.
ACCOUNT_DETAIL.INFO_FUNDS_LIMIT: Only BTC and STX balances are displayed. Other assets will appear after onboarding.

SELECT_ADDRESS_TYPE.TITLE: Preferred Address Type
SELECT_ADDRESS_TYPE.DESCRIPTION: Select the default Bitcoin payment address type you would like to use for all accounts. You can switch at any time from settings.
SELECT_ADDRESS_TYPE.ACCOUNT_SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION: The balances shown are cumulative across all found accounts for each address type.
SELECT_ADDRESS_TYPE.ACCOUNT_SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION_NO_FUNDS: No balances found for this seed phrase.

STACKING_SCREEN.STACKING_INFO: Pool your STX with other stackers to earn real BTC with low minimums. Rewards are distributed after the end of every 2-week cycle.
STACKING_SCREEN.STACK_FOR_REWARD: Stack your coins to earn rewards
STACKING_SCREEN.XVERSE_POOL: Xverse delegated pooling allows everyone to participate in Stacking and earn rewards.
STACKING_SCREEN.NO_EARN_OPTION: No Earn options currently available for this wallet type.

NFT_DASHBOARD_SCREEN.ERROR_RETRIEVING: We are having trouble retrieving data.
NFT_DASHBOARD_SCREEN.RARE_SATS_NOTICE_DETAIL: Xverse supports most rare sats, but your sats may have other attributes.
NFT_DASHBOARD_SCREEN.FROM_RARE_SAT_BUNDLE: This inscription belongs to the same bundle as other assets. Transferring it will involve transferring the full bundle.
NFT_DASHBOARD_SCREEN.HOLDS_RARE_SAT: This inscription holds a rare sat.

RESTORE_FUND_SCREEN.TITLE: Recover assets
RESTORE_FUND_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: If you sent Ordinals or Runes to your Bitcoin payment address, you can recover it and send it to the correct address.
RESTORE_FUND_SCREEN.RECOVER_BTC_DESC: If you sent Bitcoin to your Ordinals address.

RESTORE_BTC_SCREEN.TITLE: Recover BTC
RESTORE_BTC_SCREEN.NO_FUNDS: You don't have any funds stored on your ordinal address.
RESTORE_BTC_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: You have Bitcoin stored in your ordinal address. You can transfer them to your payment address so they can be used for payments and are shown in your balance.

RESTORE_ORDINAL_SCREEN.TITLE: Recover Ordinals
RESTORE_ORDINAL_SCREEN.NO_FUNDS: You don't have any Ordinals stored on your Bitcoin payment address.
RESTORE_ORDINAL_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: You have Ordinals stored in your Bitcoin payment address. You can transfer them to your Ordinals address so that they show up in your collection.

RECOVER_RUNES_SCREEN.TITLE: Recover Runes
RECOVER_RUNES_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: Your Bitcoin payment address holds some Runes. To avoid accidentally spending them in Bitcoin payments, you can transfer them to your ordinals address, where you can manage your Runes portfolio
RECOVER_RUNES_SCREEN.NO_RUNES: You don't have any Runes stored on your Bitcoin payment address.
RECOVER_RUNES_SCREEN.INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: You don't have enough bitcoin to cover the restore transaction.

NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.REFRESHING_THUMBNAIL_TIMEOUT_HOURS_one: We've queued this thumbnail for an update. Try to refresh again in {{count}} hour.
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.REFRESHING_THUMBNAIL_TIMEOUT_HOURS_other: We've queued this thumbnail for an update. Try to refresh again in {{count}} hours.
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.REFRESHING_THUMBNAIL_TIMEOUT_MINUTES_one: We've queued this thumbnail for an update. Try to refresh again in {{count}} minute.
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.REFRESHING_THUMBNAIL_TIMEOUT_MINUTES_oth: We've queued this thumbnail for an update. Try to refresh again in {{count}} minutes.
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.REFRESHING_THUMBNAIL_ERROR: Failed to refresh thumbnail. Please try again.
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.NAME: Name
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.CREATOR: Creator
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.ORDINAL_PENDING_SEND_DESCRIPTION: This Ordinal is already in a pending transfer.
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.RARE_SATS_BUNDLE_DESCRIPTION: This inscription belongs to the same bundle as other assets.

RESET_WALLET_SCREEN.ENTER_PASSWORD: Enter your password to reset your wallet

SETTING_SCREEN.TITLE: Settings

PRIVACY_PREFERENCES.TITLE: Privacy Preferences
PRIVACY_PREFERENCES.DESCRIPTION: Help improve the app experience, by allowing Xverse to collect anonymized usage data. This data cannot be used to identify you or your wallet.

SETTING_SCREEN.RESET_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: This will reset your wallet from this browser. Make sure you have your seed phrase backed up.
SETTING_SCREEN.BACKUP_WALLET_UNLOCK_SEED: Enter your password to reveal your seed phrase
SETTING_SCREEN.ENTER_PASSWORD: Enter your password to reset your wallet
SETTING_SCREEN.LOCK_COUNTDOWN_TITLE: Select the time duration before the wallet locks automatically.
SETTING_SCREEN.ENABLE_ORDINALS_DETAIL: Automatically scan your ordinal address for ordinals and display them in your collectibles and transaction review screens
SETTING_SCREEN.ENABLE_RARE_SATS_DETAIL: Automatically scan your ordinal address for rare sats and display them in your collectibles and transaction review screens
SETTING_SCREEN.ENABLE_SPEED_UP_TRANSACTIONS_DETAIL: Allows you to speed up unconfirmed transactions by paying a higher fee.

PREFERRED_BTC_ADDRESS.TITLE: Preferred Bitcoin Address
PREFERRED_BTC_ADDRESS.DESCRIPTION: You can switch between Native SegWit (more efficient) and  Nested SegWit for your transactions. The selected address will be used for sending, receiving, and connecting with dapps. Your total balance includes funds from both addresses, and you can switch back anytime.

DELETE_ADDRESS_DIALOG.TITLE: Delete address "{{name}}"?
DELETE_ADDRESS_DIALOG.CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete this address?

NO_ADDRESSES.TITLE: No saved address yet
NO_ADDRESSES.DESCRIPTION: Your saved addresses will be displayed here after you add them.

ERROR.FETCH_FAILED: Could not fetch address book entries

UNISAT_DIALOG.TITLE: Delist on Unisat
UNISAT_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Delisting on Unisat will perform on-chain delisting for your runes bundle on all marketplaces. The transaction needs to confirm before you can relist.
UNISAT_DIALOG.CALLOUT: This transaction will perform on-chain delisting for your runes on all marketplaces and has to confirm before you can list again.

SIGNATURE_REQUEST.TITLE: Sign Message
SIGNATURE_REQUEST.ACTION_DISCLAIMER: No transactions will be broadcast and no fees will be applied.
SIGNATURE_REQUEST.SIGNING_WARNING: By signing this message, you prove that you are the owner of an account without broadcasting any on chain transactions. This signature cannot be used to send transactions on your behalf. You should only sign messages you trust.

NO_STACKS_AUTH_SUPPORT.TITLE: This wallet does not have a Stacks address.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect Your Ledger
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the {{name}} app.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE: We weren't able to connect to your device.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE_DEVICE_LOCKED: Your Ledger device is locked. Please unlock it to continue.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm the transaction
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Authorise the signature on your device to continue.
CONFIRM.ERROR_SUBTITLE: The signature request encountered an error. Please check that your Ledger Bitcoin app is version 2.1.3 or newer.

DENIED.ERROR_SUBTITLE: The signature has been rejected. You can try again or close this tab.

INVALID.ERROR_SUBTITLE: Your Ledger device has rejected the message stating it is invalid.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Signature confirmed
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: This transaction will be broadcast by the sponsor.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect Your Keystone
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: Connect your Keystone device, make sure it's unlocked, and on the homepage.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE: We weren't able to connect to your device.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE_DEVICE_LOCKED: Your Keystone device is locked. Please unlock it to continue.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm transaction
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Confirm the transaction on your device to continue.
CONFIRM.ERROR_SUBTITLE: Unable to connect to device, ensure your Keystone 3 Pro is connected and on the homepage.

DENIED.ERROR_SUBTITLE: The signature has been rejected. You can try again or close this tab.

INVALID.ERROR_SUBTITLE: Your Keystone device has rejected the message stating it is invalid.

CONFIRM.NOT_MATCH_MFP: Message rejected. Please select the correct wallet.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Signature confirmed
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: This transaction will be broadcast by the sponsor.

COMPLETE.MESSAGE: Your ordinal has been successfully inscribed and should appear in a few minutes.

LONG.INVALID_JSON_CONTENT: The content is not valid JSON. Please verify the content of your inscription.
LONG.INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: Your balance is insufficient to process this transaction. Please add more funds to your wallet or try with a lower fee rate
LONG.INVALID_FEE_RATE: The fee applied to this transaction is too low. To apply a higher fee, select edit fees at the bottom of this screen.
LONG.INVALID_SERVICE_FEE_CONFIG: The calling application sent an invalid payload. Please contact the application developer.
LONG.INVALID_CONTENT: The ordinal content you are trying to inscribe is not valid. Please verify the content of your inscription.
LONG.CONTENT_TOO_BIG: The ordinal you are trying to inscribe is too large. Try reducing the weight of your content.
LONG.INSCRIPTION_VALUE_TOO_LOW: The calling application sent an invalid payload. Please contact the application developer.
LONG.FAILED_TO_FINALIZE: The inscription transaction failed to finalize. Please try again or contact support.
LONG.SERVER_ERROR: An unknown server error occurred. Please try again or contact support.

ERRORS.TOO_MANY_REPEATS: You can only create up to {{maxRepeats}} inscriptions in a single request
ERRORS.UNCONFIRMED_UTXO: Some of your balance consists of unconfirmed outputs. You don't have enough confirmed funds to proceed with this transaction
ERRORS.LEDGER_INSCRIPTION: This inscription service is not compatible with Ledger accounts. Please switch to a standard account to inscribe.

ERROR_SCREEN.CONTACT_SUPPORT: If the issue persists, you can contact support at

SEND_BRC20.SEND_INFO_SUBTITLE: To transfer BRC-20 tokens, you need to make two separate transactions:
SEND_BRC20.SEND_STEP_1: Create an Ordinal inscription with the token and amount you would like to send.
SEND_BRC20.SEND_STEP_2: Once you have the transfer inscription, you can send it to your recipient to transfer the BRC-20 token.
SEND_BRC20.MAKE_SURE_THE_RECIPIENT: Make sure the recipient's wallet supports BRC-20 tokens.

ERROR_CODES.INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: Insufficient BTC balance for transaction fees

EXECUTE_BRC20.YOUR_TRANSACTION_HAS_BEEN: Your transaction has been successfully submitted.

SWAP_SCREEN.SELECT_BUNDLES: Select bundles to proceed with the swap

SWAP_SCREEN.SLIPPAGE_WARNING: Your transaction may be frontrun and result in an unfavorable trade

SWAP_SCREEN.BAD_QUOTE_WARNING_DESC: The minimum amount you will receive will result in a loss of over {{percentage}}% of your trade's value. This could be due to low liquidity in the pool or other provider issues. Please review the details carefully before proceeding with the swap.
SWAP_SCREEN.UNKNOWN_QUOTE_VALUE_WARNING_DESC: The market value of the token you will receive is unknown. Review details carefully before proceeding with the swap.
SWAP_SCREEN.UTXO_PROVIDER_DISCLAIMER: Based on floor price / lot availability of your order.

SWAP_CONFIRM_SCREEN.THIS_IS_A_SPONSORED_TRANSACTION: This is a sponsored transaction, no transaction fees will be deducted from your account.
SWAP_CONFIRM_SCREEN.SWAP_TRANSACTION_CANNOT_BE_SPONSORED: Swap transaction cannot be sponsored while you have a pending transaction.

RARITY_DETAIL.RARITY_INFO: Looking for more rare sats? Your sats may have other attributes which are not supported yet.
RARITY_DETAIL.MYTHIC: The first sat of the genesis block.
RARITY_DETAIL.LEGENDARY: The first sat of each cycle.
RARITY_DETAIL.EPIC: The first sat of each halving epoch.
RARITY_DETAIL.RARE: The first sat of each difficulty adjustment period.
RARITY_DETAIL.UNCOMMON: The first sat of each block.
RARITY_DETAIL.BLACK_LEGENDARY: The last sat of each cycle.
RARITY_DETAIL.BLACK_EPIC: The last sat of each halving epoch.
RARITY_DETAIL.BLACK_RARE: The last sat of each difficulty adjustment period.
RARITY_DETAIL.BLACK_UNCOMMON: The last sat of each block.
RARITY_DETAIL.FIBONACCI: Sats with IDs that follow the Fibonacci Sequence.
RARITY_DETAIL.1D_PALINDROME: Sats with number composed of only 1 digit (ex: 888888888888).
RARITY_DETAIL.2D_PALINDROME: Sats with palindromic number, composed of only 2 digit (ex: 8888822288888).
RARITY_DETAIL.3D_PALINDROME: Sats with palindromic number, composed of only 3 digit (ex: 8885522255888).
RARITY_DETAIL.SEQUENCE_PALINDROME: Sats with palindromic number, and a sequence of at least 3 consecutive identical digits (ex: 3275433345723).
RARITY_DETAIL.PERFECT_PALINCEPTION: Sats with palindromic number made of a subsequence which is also a palindrome of at least 2 distinct digits.
RARITY_DETAIL.PALIBLOCK_PALINDROME: Sats with palindromic number, in a block with a palindromic number.
RARITY_DETAIL.ALPHA: The first sats in each bitcoin. They always end in at least 8 zeros.
RARITY_DETAIL.OMEGA: The last sats in each bitcoin. They always end in at least 8 nines.
RARITY_DETAIL.FIRST_TRANSACTION: Sats from the 10 bitcoins Satoshi Nakamoto sent Hal Finney in the first bitcoin transaction.
RARITY_DETAIL.BLOCK9: Sats mined in Block 9 (the first block with sats circulating today).
RARITY_DETAIL.BLOCK9_450: Sats in the first bitcoin of the 9th block. All sats from 45,000,000,000 to 45,099,999,999 (included).
RARITY_DETAIL.BLOCK78: Sats mined by Hal Finney in Block 78 (the first block mined by someone other than Satoshi).
RARITY_DETAIL.BLOCK286: Sats mined in the second-ever Bitcoin transaction, made and mined by Satoshi Nakamoto.
RARITY_DETAIL.NAKAMOTO: Sats mined by Satoshi Nakamoto himself.
RARITY_DETAIL.VINTAGE: Sats mined in the first 1000 bitcoin blocks.
RARITY_DETAIL.PIZZA: Sats involved in the famous pizza transaction from 2010.
RARITY_DETAIL.JPEG: Sats involved in the possible first bitcoin trade for an image on February 24, 2010.
RARITY_DETAIL.HITMAN: Sats involved in a transaction allegedly made by Ross Ulbricht to hire a Hitman.
RARITY_DETAIL.SILK_ROAD: Sats seized from Silk Road and auctioned off on June 27, 2014 by US Marshals.
RARITY_DETAIL.LEGACY: Sats that were given out in paper wallets during Casey Rodarmor's Bitcoin workshop back in June 2022.

RARE_SATS.SEND_INDIVIDUAL_SAT_INFO: Rare Sats and inscriptions in the same bundle cannot be sent separately.
RARE_SATS.BUNDLE_PENDING_SEND_DESCRIPTION: This bundle is already in a pending transfer.

REQUEST_ERRORS.ADDRESS_MISMATCH:
The app is requesting a signature from an address that doesn't match the account currently active in your wallet.

To fix this:
- Make sure the account in Xverse matches the one connected to the app
- Try reconnecting to the app
REQUEST_ERRORS.ADDRESS_TYPE_MISMATCH:
The app is requesting a signature from a Bitcoin payment address type that doesn't match the one currently active in your wallet.

To fix this:
- Make sure the Bitcoin payment address type (Native SegWit or Nested SegWit) selected in Xverse matches the app
- Try reconnecting to the app
REQUEST_ERRORS.ADDRESS_MISMATCH_STX: The app is requesting a signature from an address that doesn't match the one currently active in your Xverse wallet.
REQUEST_ERRORS.NETWORK_MISMATCH: There's a mismatch between your active network and the network you're logged in with on the app.
REQUEST_ERRORS.PSBT_CANT_PARSE_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: The requested transaction is invalid and cannot be processed. Please contact the developer of the requesting app for support.

CHANGE_NETWORK_REQUEST.TITLE: Allow this app to switch the network?
CHANGE_NETWORK_REQUEST.INFO_MESSAGE: This will switch the selected network in Xverse and connect the app to the new network.
CHANGE_NETWORK_REQUEST.CALLOUT: Make sure you trust the app requesting the network change.
